hero2026.title: Barranqui-IA
hero2026.subtitle: Build the future from the Caribbean with Artificial Intelligence

about.title: What is Barranqui-IA?
about.intro: Barranqui-IA is a 48-hour hackathon where developers, designers, data lovers and builders come together to create real solutions with AI.
about.step2: Participants form teams and develop functional prototypes in 48 hours
about.step3: Finalist projects are presented and compete for up to $10,000,000 in prizes
about.caribeNote: Participating teams will have the opportunity to apply to continue their project in the Caribe-IA program, where they will receive training in software development and business to turn their prototype into a startup and present it at Tech Caribe, the Caribbean tech market on July 25th.

howToLive.title: How do you experience a hackathon?
howToLive.subtitle: Get ready for a unique experience.
howToLive.saturdayRecommendation: Recommendation: come prepared to work through the night
howToLive.videoTitle: How do you experience a hackathon?

tickets.title: Get your ticket
tickets.motivation: You don't need a team yet. You don't need an idea. Just the desire to build.

isItForYou.title: Not sure if it's for you?
isItForYou.intro1: A hackathon is a safe space to explore technology, learn and push your limits. You'll be surrounded by other participants who, like you, don't have all the answers but dare to build with the support of artificial intelligence.
isItForYou.intro2: There will also be mentors to help you solve your doubts and guide you to complete your prototype.
isItForYou.welcome: Welcome developers, designers, students and any professional (or non-professional) who dares to break their own limits.

sponsors.title: This is possible thanks to the support of

footer.mission: Driving technological innovation and digital skills development in the community.

main.tagline: The open innovation program that transforms Caribbean talent into market-ready AI startups.

summaryMain.title: What is Caribe-IA?
summaryMain.manifesto: It is a system to create technology-based startups powered by artificial intelligence from the Colombian Caribbean with an international projection.
summaryMain.card1Desc: Develop a minimum viable product with cutting-edge AI technologies.
summaryMain.card2Desc: Get feedback from experts and real users to refine your solution.
summaryMain.card3Desc: Access funding opportunities and pilots with partner companies.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.step1_2: Technical and business mentoring in real time
howItWorks.step2Helper: Only selected projects advance to this phase.
howItWorks.step2_2: Specialized workshops in AI and business

phases.title: Participate in a hackathon
phases.barranquiDesc: The largest AI hackathon in the Colombian Caribbean
phases.helperText: The best teams can advance to incubation or pilot with partner companies.
phases.afterHackPara: Projects with the best potential can continue their journey in Caribe-IA.
phases.afterHack_2: Participate with partner companies that propose challenges for pilots and real validation
phases.afterHackNote: And present results at TechCaribe Fest Demo Day (Show)
phases.empresaReto: I'm a company / I propose a challenge →

audience.title: Who is Caribe-IA for?
audience.talentoDesc: Developers, data scientists, designers and creatives who want to build with AI.
audience.emprendedoresDesc: With or without an idea, look to turn your vision into a scalable AI startup.
audience.empresasDesc: Open innovation, propose challenges and access AI solutions developed by Caribbean talent.
audience.ctaReto: I want to propose a challenge

poweredByCV.caribeDesc: Caribe Ventures is a venture studio focused on creating, investing in and scaling technological startups from the Caribbean.
poweredByCV.title: Caribe-IA is its flagship program for creating AI startups.
poweredByCV.para: Through hackathons, incubation and Demo Day, we connect talent, companies and investors to build the Caribbean AI ecosystem.

summary2025.title: What is Barranqui-IA?
summary2025.text1: Barranqui-IA was the most exciting artificial intelligence hackathon in Colombia. A space where creative, technical and visionary people came together to solve real challenges using the power of AI. It didn't matter if they came with an idea, without a team or with prior experience: everyone was able to build, learn and transform.
summary2025.text2: During the weekend of May 3-4, participants experienced creating a solution from scratch, with the support of expert mentors, ecosystem allies and a community that believes in the power of technology to change the world. Solutions were based on the use of artificial intelligence.
summary2025.text3: At the end of the event they presented their solutions in a pitch before a specialized jury to compete for amazing prizes. More than $10,000,000 COP in prizes were awarded.

topics2025.title: Thematic lines
topics2025.intro: Barranqui-IA had 7 thematic lines to guide participants in solving relevant problems with artificial intelligence.
topics2025.topic1: Business challenge x Chamber of Commerce BAQ

location2025.title: Where was the hackathon?
location2025.intro: The Barranqui-IA hackathon took place in two amazing spaces that combined the best of the Caribbean tech ecosystem:
location2025.para1: We kicked off the hackathon on the Uninorte campus, with challenge presentation, team formation, mentoring and the first part of project development.
location2025.para2: When night fell, we moved to the Fundación Código Abierto headquarters, where the energy didn't stop. We continued working through the night in a comfortable, creative space full of good vibes.
location2025.para3: There were snacks, coffee and special dynamics to keep morale high. And yes, some participants brought their pillows and rested for a few hours.
location2025.para4: We met again at Universidad del Norte to recharge with a joint breakfast and prepare the final touches before pitches and the awards ceremony.

graphics2025.title: Event data and graphics
graphics2025.intro: Learn in detail the number of attendees, participants and workshop leaders who were part of this second edition of Barranqui-IA, the largest AI hackathon on the coast.

hero2_2024.headline: On May 4-5, 2024, the coast vibrated with artificial intelligence
hero2_2024.para1: Barranqui-IA left its mark on Caribbean innovation. More than 150 bright minds, in 21 teams, brought AI solutions to life in a dynamic and collaborative environment.
hero2_2024.para2: More than a competition, it was a marathon of creativity and learning, where passion proved that there are no barriers to innovation. Barranquilla reaffirmed its place as a technological epicenter, driving talent and transformation.
hero2_2024.cta: Together we turned ideas into the future!

hackathon2024.title: What is a Hackathon?
hackathon2024.para1: A Hackathon is an event where programmers, designers and entrepreneurs collaborate to develop innovative solutions in a limited time. It is an intense work environment where creativity and innovation are key to solving technological challenges.
hackathon2024.para2: During the event, participants will form multidisciplinary teams and will have 48 hours to develop functional prototypes. Topics can range from artificial intelligence to application development to solve specific societal problems.
